trans-unit.source: Interval between state checks. Default interval is 5s. Decreasing the interval may slightly decrease waiting time but be aware that every status check is a call to jboss-cli which is a java process. If interval is smaller than process cleanup time it may easily lead to excessive resource consumption.
trans-unit.target: 状态检查之间的时间间隔。默认的间隔时间是5s。减少间隔时间可能会稍微减少等待时间,但是要注意每次状态检查都是对java进程jboss-cli的调用,如果间隔时间小于进程清理时间,很容易导致资源消耗过大。如果间隔时间小于进程清理时间,很容易导致资源消耗过大。

The returned string will be the contents of the managed file. For example:

trans-unit.source: It's important to understand how this particular proxy works. Salt.modules.dracr is a standard Salt execution module. If you pull up the docs for it you'll see that almost every function in the module takes credentials and a target host. When credentials and a host aren't passed, Salt runs racadm against the local machine. If you wanted you could run functions from this module on any host where an appropriate version of racadm is installed, and that host would reach out over the network and communicate with the chassis.
trans-unit.target: 了解此特定代理的工作方式非常重要。 Salt.modules.dracr 是标准的Salt执行模块。如果为它拉起文档，您将看到模块中几乎每个函数都具有凭据和目标主机。如果没有传递凭据和主机，Salt会对本地计算机运行 racadm 。如果需要，您可以在安装了适当版本的 racadm 的任何主机上运行此模块中的功能，并且该主机将通过网络进行连接并与机箱通信。

trans-unit.source: It's important to understand how this particular proxy works. Salt.modules.vsphere is a standard Salt execution module. If you pull up the docs for it you'll see that almost every function in the module takes credentials and a target host. When credentials and a host aren't passed, Salt runs commands through pyVmomi against the local machine. If you wanted, you could run functions from this module on any host where an appropriate version of pyVmomi is installed, and that host would reach out over the network and communicate with the ESXi host.
trans-unit.target: 了解此特定代理的工作方式非常重要。 Salt.modules.vsphere 是标准的Salt执行模块。如果为它拉起文档，您将看到模块中几乎每个函数都具有凭据和目标主机。如果没有传递凭据和主机，则Salt通过 pyVmomi 对本地计算机运行命令。如果需要，可以在安装了适当版本的 pyVmomi 的任何主机上运行此模块中的功能，并且该主机可以通过网络与ESXi主机进行通信。

trans-unit.source: List of dicts of filters and tags, where 'filters' is a dict suitable for passing to the 'filters' argument of boto_ec2.get_all_volumes(), and 'tags' is a dict of tags to be set on volumes as matched by the given filters. The filter syntax is extended to permit passing either a list of volume_ids or an instance_name (with instance_name being the Name tag of the instance to which the desired volumes are mapped). Each mapping in the list is applied separately, so multiple sets of volumes can be all tagged differently with one call to this function.
trans-unit.target: filters和tag的dict列表,其中'filters'是适合传递给boto_ec2.get_all_volumes()的'filters'参数的dict,'tag'是要在给定的filters匹配的卷上设置的tag的dict。过滤器语法被扩展为允许传递volume_ids列表或instance_name(instance_name是所需卷被映射到的实例的名称标签)。列表中的每一个映射都是单独应用的,所以多组卷可以通过调用这个函数来标记不同的卷。

trans-unit.source: List of dicts of filters and tags, where 'filters' is a dict suitable for passing to the 'filters' argument of get_all_volumes() above, and 'tags' is a dict of tags to be set on volumes (via create_tags/delete_tags) as matched by the given filters. The filter syntax is extended to permit passing either a list of volume_ids or an instance_name (with instance_name being the Name tag of the instance to which the desired volumes are mapped). Each mapping in the list is applied separately, so multiple sets of volumes can be all tagged differently with one call to this function. If filtering by instance Name, You may additionally limit the instances matched by passing in a list of desired instance states. The default set of states is ('pending', 'rebooting', 'running', 'stopping', 'stopped').
trans-unit.target: 过滤器和标签的指令列表,其中'过滤器'是一个适合传递给上面get_all_volumes()的'过滤器'参数的指令,而'标签'是一个要在卷上设置的标签指令(通过create_tags/delete_tags),这些标签与给定的过滤器相匹配。过滤器语法被扩展为允许传递volume_ids列表或instance_name(instance_name是所需卷被映射到的实例的名称标签)。列表中的每一个映射都是单独应用的,所以多组卷可以通过调用这个函数来标记不同的卷。如果按实例名称过滤,您可以通过传递所需实例状态列表来额外限制匹配的实例。默认的状态集是('待定'、'重启'、'运行'、'停止'、'停止')。

trans-unit.source: Lists entries stored in the specified bank.
trans-unit.target: 列出存储在指定银行中的条目。

trans-unit.source: Lists installed packages. Due to how nix works, it defaults to just doing a nix-env -q.
trans-unit.target: 列出已安装的软件包。由于nix的工作方式，默认情况下仅执行 nix-env -q 。

trans-unit.source: Lists of Zookeeper Hosts (Default: '127.0.0.1:2181)
trans-unit.target: Zookeeper主机列表(默认:'127.0.0.1:2181)

trans-unit.source: Lists packages belonging to a certain group
trans-unit.target: 列出属于某组的包

trans-unit.source: Lists permissions for vhost via rabbitmqctl list_permissions
trans-unit.target: 通过rabbitmqctl list_permissions列出vhost的权限。

trans-unit.source: Lists ports from csf.conf based on direction and protocol. e.g. - TCP_IN, TCP_OUT, UDP_IN, UDP_OUT, etc..
trans-unit.target: 根据方向和协议列出csf.conf中的端口,例如:-TCP_IN,TCP_OUT,UDP_IN,UDP_OUT等。

trans-unit.source: Lists running nspawn containers
trans-unit.target: 列出正在运行的nspawn容器

trans-unit.source: Lists stopped nspawn containers
trans-unit.target: 列表中停止的nspawn容器

trans-unit.source: Lists tags of the port.
trans-unit.target: 列出 port 的标签。

trans-unit.source: Lists the licenses assigned to an entity
trans-unit.target: 列出分配给实体的许可证

trans-unit.source: Lists the partitions on a disk. The disk can be specified either by the canonical name, or by the scsi_address.
trans-unit.target: 列出一个磁盘上的分区,可以通过规范名称或scsi_address指定磁盘。磁盘可以由标准名称或scsi_address指定。

trans-unit.source: Lists the previous versions of a directory backed up using Salt's file state backup system.
trans-unit.target: 列出使用Salt的文件状态备份系统备份的目录的先前版本。

trans-unit.source: Lists the previous versions of a file backed up using Salt's file state backup system.
trans-unit.target: 列出使用Salt的文件状态备份系统备份的文件的先前版本。

trans-unit.source: Lists the valid shells on this system via the /etc/shells file
trans-unit.target: 通过/etc/shells文件列出本系统中有效的shell。

trans-unit.source: Lists which of a group's packages are installed and which are not installed
trans-unit.target: 列出一组软件包中哪些已经安装,哪些没有安装。

trans-unit.source: Live host base URL. If not specified, derives the host base from the provider configuration.
trans-unit.target: 实时主机基地 URL。如果未指定,则从提供商配置中获取主机基地。

trans-unit.source: Load a list of configuration commands on the remote device, via Netmiko.
trans-unit.target: 通过Netmiko加载远程设备上的配置命令列表。

trans-unit.source: Load a ruleset from the specific file, overwriting the currently loaded ruleset.
trans-unit.target: 从特定文件中加载规则集,覆盖当前加载的规则集。

trans-unit.source: Load a tar archive that was created using docker.save (or via the Docker CLI using docker save).
trans-unit.target: 加载使用创建一个tar归档 docker.save （使用或通过码头工人CLI docker save ）。

trans-unit.source: Load additional configuration from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的文件中加载其他配置。

trans-unit.source: Load all firewall rules CLI Example:
trans-unit.target: 加载所有防火墙规则 CLI 示例。

trans-unit.source: Load and replace the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 加载并更换配置。

trans-unit.source: Load and replace the configuration. Default: False (will apply load merge).
trans-unit.target: 加载并替换配置。默认值： False （将应用负载合并）。

trans-unit.source: Load and replace the configuration. Default: False.
trans-unit.target: 加载并替换配置。默认值： False 。

trans-unit.source: Load and replace the configuration. Default: True.
trans-unit.target: 加载并替换配置。默认值： True 。

trans-unit.source: Load attributes from a JSON file or URL
trans-unit.target: 从JSON文件或URL加载属性

trans-unit.source: Load data by keys.
trans-unit.target: 按键加载数据。

trans-unit.source: Load environment.
trans-unit.target: 负载环境。

trans-unit.source: Load existing tables and their descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 加载现有的表格和它们的描述。

trans-unit.source: Load fixture data
trans-unit.target: 装入夹具数据

trans-unit.source: Load specified fault manager module
trans-unit.target: 装入指定的故障管理器模块

trans-unit.source: Load tests either from one file, or a set of files
trans-unit.target: 从一个文件或一组文件加载测试。

trans-unit.source: Load the public key file if exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在的话,加载公钥文件。

trans-unit.source: Load the register from msgpack files
trans-unit.target: 从msgpack文件中加载寄存器

trans-unit.source: Load the specified kernel module
trans-unit.target: 加载指定的内核模块
